titleStmt.title: The intentions of the armie of the kingdome of Scotland, declared to their bretheren of England: by the Commissioners of the late Parliament, and by the generall, noblemen, barrons, and other officers of the armie.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.
Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646.
Scotland. Army.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the Yeare of God, 1640.

notesStmt.note: Place and publisher from STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: stained, edges torn, with slight loss of print.
Reproductions of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
